title: Liquor stores to be closed on 15th, 16th May
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department Of Excise in Sri Lanka said that all liquor stores in the island should be closed on the 15th and 16th of May.
The spokesman of The Department Of Excise in Sri Lanka Kapila Kumarasinghe stated that the law will be strictly enforced against liquor store owners who violate the order.
Wickremesinghe will enable SL to address its challenges: Canadian HC
